summary: This is an FBI 302 form summarizing an interview conducted on July 27, 2020, with an individual (likely a witness or victim) at her residence in Maricopa, Arizona. The interview was conducted by an FBI Special Agent and a Maricopa Police Department Detective, and the document references a related police report.

persons.name: Waggner
persons.context: Was interviewed at her residence in Maricopa, Arizona, by an FBI Special Agent and a police detective. The document references her previous name and provides her location.

persons.name: FBI Special Agent
persons.context: Conducted an in-person interview with Waggner on July 27, 2020, in Maricopa, Arizona, alongside a police detective.

persons.name: Maricopa Police Department Detective
persons.context: Participated in the interview of Waggner on July 27, 2020, in Maricopa, Arizona, alongside an FBI Special Agent.

persons.name: Maricopa Police Department Officer
persons.context: Authored the police report (R. 200722037) related to the investigation, a copy of which was provided to the FBI Special Agent on August 4, 2020.

connections.description: The FBI Special Agent interviewed Waggner as part of an investigation.
The police detective co-interviewed Waggner alongside the FBI Special Agent.
Worked together to conduct the interview of Waggner on July 27, 2020.
The police officer's report was provided to the FBI Special Agent for the investigation.

events.title: Interview of Waggner
events.description: An in-person interview was conducted with Waggner at her residence in Maricopa, Arizona, by an FBI Special Agent and a Maricopa Police Department Detective.

events.title: Police Report Provided to FBI
events.description: The FBI Special Agent was provided with a copy of the City of Maricopa Police Department Officer's report (R. 200722037) related to the investigation.

keyFacts: An interview was conducted with an individual named Waggner on July 27, 2020, at her residence in Maricopa, Arizona.
The interview was a joint effort between the FBI and the Maricopa Police Department.
A related police report (R. 200722037) was provided to the FBI on August 4, 2020.
The document is an FBI 302 form, which is a summary of an investigative interview, and contains neither recommendations nor conclusions.
